# loading package

```{r}
#| code-fold: false
pacman::p_load(ggiraph, plotly, tidyverse,
               corrplot, ggstatsplot,ggraph, igraph, 
               heatmaply, treemap, dplyr,GGally)
```

loading dataset

```{r}
#| code-fold: false
bmi <- read_csv("data/bmi_data.csv")
country <- read_csv("data/country_data.csv")
```

# Traditional Clustering

## Corrplot

only use numeric values and country

```{r}
bmi_numeric <- bmi %>%
  select(country, where(is.numeric))
```

filter data by a particular year

```{r}
filtered_data <- bmi_numeric %>%
  filter(year == 2020)

```

## Scatter Plot

```{r}
ggstatsplot::ggcorrmat(
  data = filtered_data, 
  cor.vars = 3:12,
  ggcorrplot.args = list(outline.color = "black", 
                         hc.order = TRUE,
                         tl.cex = 10),
  title    = "",
  subtitle = ""
)
```
